text:
US House of Representatives Office of the CAO | Washington, DC | Full Time

The CAO's Web Systems group manages websites, APIs, and a multitude of web applications for the US House of Representatives. The position is for a non-senior developer, so we are looking for a candidate who has demonstrated willingness to learn and proven ability to synthesize technology solutions from business problems but may not have a deep work experience yet. We work on fun problems that have the potential for significant impact for constituent engagement and open government.

http://www.house.gov/content/jobs/vacancyDetails.php?Positio...

(position closes 9/4...)
